string-array.name: midterm_questions
string-array.item: 1. Who was the most well known pupil of Socrates?
2. What was Socrates\' famous method during his philosophizing?
3. Who is the father of western philosophy?
4. Which are correct parts of the definition of philosophy?

string-array.name: midterm_answersText
string-array.item: The study of virtue,The study of knowledge,The study of cities,The study of existence
